text: Nena, “Ngati atate anu, ana anu, abale anu, akazi anu, a pabanja lanu, chuma chimene mwapeza, katundu wa malonda amene muopa kuonongeka, ndi nyumba zimene mukonda ndi zopambana kwambiri kwa inu kuposa Mulungu ndi Mtumwi wake ndi kulimbikira mu njira yake, ndiye dikirani mpaka pamene Mulungu abweretsa chilamulo chake. Mulungu satsogolera anthu ochita zoipa.”
